oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mary Rhea Cooper with dog
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of Mary Rhea Cooper holding a doll while standing next to a dog.

Mary Rhea Cooper (1911-1938) was the daughter of Amelia Townsend Tigert (1891-1928) and Ernest Bonner Cooper (1869-1951). Dr. Holland Tigert and Leila Shute Tigert, her mother's uncle and aunt, adopted Mary sometime after her parents divorced. Mary lived at Grassmere with the Tigerts until her death.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Family farms--Tennessee--History
Black and white photographs; Dogs; Dolls
